name: Living Proof Volumizing Spray
description: A styling spray that creates instant volume and texture that’s almost as light as air for big, lasting results on dry hair.

name: Moroccanoil Dry Shampoo
description: This dry spray contains ultra-fine, oil-absorbing rice starch that removes buildup and odor, leaving hair instantly clean and refreshed.

name: Dove Nutritive Solutions Intensive Repair Shampoo
description: Shampoo for damaged hair enriched with Keratin repair actives.</

name: Curlmix Regrowth Serum
description: This regrowth serum is excellent for growth as the main ingredient is Organic Argan Oil.

name: Miss Jessie's Leave In Condish
description: This lightweight leave-in conditioner and detangler acts as the ultimate frizz fighter and moisturizer for wavy, curly, tight curly or transitioner’s hair.

name: Moroccan Oil Beach Wave Mousse
description: This mousse creates waves for an effortlessly windswept look with flexible hold, while UV absorbers help protect hair from sun damage.

name: Miss Jessie's Quick Curls
description: This fast-acting, no fuss, lightweight curl cream is excellent for finger styling relaxed hair.

name: Coconut Shea Curl Defining Creme
description: This medium-hold styler brings out curls and replenishes vital moisture and protects against protein loss.

name: As I Am Curling Jelly
description: This product defines, shines, and helps your culrs do what nature intended.

name: Worlds of Curls: Curl Activator
description: Hair gel that awakens your natural curl and softens and moisturizes your hair.

name: Curl Mix Wash 'N Go: Growth
description: This Wash 'N Go set will help define and grwo your curls. Set includes: shampoo, conditioner, moisturizer and flaxseed gel.

name: Aunt Jackie's Intensive Repair Conditioning Masque
description: This hair masque uses flaxseed, avocado and coconut oils is used to help repair damage, stop breakage, soften, shine, moisturize & condition dry, brittle, wiry hair.
